scripts.prestart: npm run copy-schemas && npm run copy-appd && node schema2Markdown.js
scripts.prebuild: npm run parent-build && npm run copy-schemas && npm run copy-appd && npm run copy-workbench && npm run copy-conformance && npm run copy-reference-ui && node schema2Markdown.js && npm run copy-workbench && npm run copy-explained
scripts.build-temp: npm run copy-schemas && npm run copy-appd && npm run copy-workbench && npm run copy-reference-ui && node schema2Markdown.js && npm run copy-workbench && npm run copy-explained && docusaurus build
scripts.parent-build: cd .. && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy-schemas: del-cli static/schemas/next/*/ && cpy "../packages/fdc3-schema/schemas/**" static/schemas/next/ && cpy "../packages/fdc3-context/schemas/context" static/schemas/next/
scripts.version-run: cross-env-shell "echo Creating version: \$VERSION... && npm run prebuild && npm run docusaurus docs:version $VERSION && npm run version:docs-schema && npm run version:docs-replace && npm run version:schemas && npm run version:schemas-replace && npm run version:appd-replace"
